attributes.action: back calls for the introduction of natural bodybuilding in the 2014 Commonwealth Games
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Natural Bodybuilding is a sport that has it's origins in the United Kingdom (Eugene Sandow born in Prussia, but resident in London was the first person to bring it to public attention) and given the Prime Minister is a servant of Her Majesty The Queen, it would make sense of Her Majesty to recognise the achievements that people can make if they make substantial lifestyle changes.
